mapper.select: select po_id, username, phone, platenumber, framenumber, carbrandname, carservicename, carmodelsname, pickuser_id, billdate, billcode, repaircode from asms.w_pickingoutorder where po_id = #{poId}
select po_id, username, phone, platenumber, framenumber, carbrandname, carservicename, carmodelsname, pickuser_id, billdate, billcode, repaircode from asms.w_pickingoutorder limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.w_pickingoutorder(username, phone, platenumber, framenumber, carbrandname, carservicename, carmodelsname, pickuser_id, billdate, billcode, repaircode) values (#{username}, #{phone}, #{platenumber}, #{framenumber}, #{carbrandname}, #{carservicename}, #{carmodelsname}, #{pickuserId}, #{billdate}, #{billcode}, #{repaircode})

insert into asms.w_pickingoutorder(username, phone, platenumber, framenumber, carbrandname, carservicename, carmodelsname, pickuser_id, billdate, billcode, repaircode) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.platenumber}, #{entity.framenumber}, #{entity.carbrandname}, #{entity.carservicename}, #{entity.carmodelsname}, #{entity.pickuserId}, #{entity.billdate}, #{entity.billcode}, #{entity.repaircode})

insert into asms.w_pickingoutorder(username, phone, platenumber, framenumber, carbrandname, carservicename, carmodelsname, pickuser_id, billdate, billcode, repaircode) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.platenumber}, #{entity.framenumber}, #{entity.carbrandname}, #{entity.carservicename}, #{entity.carmodelsname}, #{entity.pickuserId}, #{entity.billdate}, #{entity.billcode}, #{entity.repaircode})
on duplicate key update username = values(username) , phone = values(phone) , platenumber = values(platenumber) , framenumber = values(framenumber) , carbrandname = values(carbrandname) , carservicename = values(carservicename) , carmodelsname = values(carmodelsname) , pickuser_id = values(pickuser_id) , billdate = values(billdate) , billcode = values(billcode) , repaircode = values(repaircode)
mapper.update:
update asms.w_pickingoutorder
username = #{username},
phone = #{phone},
platenumber = #{platenumber},
framenumber = #{framenumber},
carbrandname = #{carbrandname},
carservicename = #{carservicename},
carmodelsname = #{carmodelsname},
pickuser_id = #{pickuserId},
billdate = #{billdate},
billcode = #{billcode},
repaircode = #{repaircode},
where po_id = #{poId}
